titles.title: Providing for the printing of the revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Fifth Congress.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 546, H. Res. 552 is considered passed House.

bill.summary: 9/28/1996--Introduced. Provides for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 105th Congress as a House document.
